name: Suds
overview: You are a wannabe Soap Opera star and you have decided to leave your farmhouse in Yorkshire to be a star. Suds is a text adventure with text on screen describing your surroundings while you type in commands to solve puzzles and complete tasks. The adventure is split into four parts. The first part has you trying to leave your house and getting to the train station. The second part is in Manchester where you have to survive Abdication Street and the TV Studio. Part three is the Cross Eyed Motel and a mad arsonist. The final part is the Dead End of London and what ever fate has lined up for you.
